message: I propose dividing the $100 with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This might seem generous, but remember, the value of money decreases with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more considering the decreasing value of money. I propose a 3:2 ratio in my favor.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 3:2 ratio in favor of Bob. This maintains a fair distribution while acknowledging the economic conditions.
